item.title: New fence is blocking footpath completely, 26th May
item.description:
I have taken a photo of the fence and of the bridge prior to the bridge which also needed clearing. The fence was clearly new and there are a lot of building works in the way

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Pluck Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another pot hole in our lane, 26th May
item.description:
What three words reference: thanks.hurry.craft This is the last photo of my multiple submission but they are by no means the only holes in the lane. In the past pot holes have been overfilled which has created their own problems. The lane has not been resurfaced for over 30 years and with a neighbour falling in one, it is now becoming a health and safety issue. There is a very poorly lady living towards the end of the lane who is undergoing treatment and finds the journey extremely uncomfortable. We might be a small lane but there are a lot of people that use it so the WHOLE lane not just patches needs to be resurfaced. I look forward to hearing from you in the very near future

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lowdilow Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is flooded on Granley Road, near Greville Court, 26th May
item.description:
The on the junction to Greville court and in front of a driveway is flooded. This issue has been present for several days. It has also happened many times in the past meaning it hasn’t been fixed or checked thoroughly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Granley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
